title: Rue de l'Abreuvoir
medium: oil on cardboard mounted to panel
provenance_text:
Maurice Utrillo [1883-1955], Paris, France. Sarah Mellon Scaife [1903-1965], Pittsburgh, PA by October 1963 until December 28, 1965 [1]; her son, Richard M. Scaife [1932-2014], Pittsburgh, PA [2]; his gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, October 1985.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Scaife lent the painting to the Utrillo exhibition at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in October-December 1963; it was no. 30, illustrated in the catalogue.
[2]. The painting was no. 43 in "Celebration: Inaugural Scaife Gallery Exhibition" in October 1974, lent by Mr. and Mrs. Richard M. Scaife.
